title: Benefit of Matched Pairs
question_text: What is the main benefit of using a matched pairs design as opposed to a controlled randomized design?

choices.text: A matched pairs design reduces measurement error.
A matched pairs design reduces variation among different aspects of the subjects.
A matched pairs design allows us to randomize subjects better.
A matched pairs design allows us to get more data points.
A matched pairs design reduces inherent bias from the people conducting the experiment.
